topic_metadata.title: The font can be changed in mathematical mode?

posts.name: Andrés Jorge Giménez Muñoz
posts.cooked:
This example changes the size of the numbers in math mode, but not the fonts.

#set text(size: 22pt, font:"OpenDyslexic")

Math mode 54

$3/4+2/3$
posts.raw:
This example changes the size of the numbers in math mode, but not the fonts.

```
#set text(size: 22pt, font:"OpenDyslexic")

Math mode 54

$3/4+2/3$
```

posts.cooked: You can change the math font with #show math.equation: set text(font: ...) but this won’t work with OpenDyslexic since it’s not a math font (math fonts include lots of symbols not found in regular fonts).
